sections.heading: 2357.71 through 2357.76 of this title, including Sections 20, 21, 22, 23, 24 and 25 of this act, shall be known and may be cited as the “Rural Venture Capital Formation Incentive Act”
sections.text: Added by Laws 2000, c. 339, § 1, eff. Jan. 1, 2001. Amended by Laws 2006, c. 281, § 17, emerg. eff. June 7, 2006.
